alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Passaic and central Bergen Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paterson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Wayne, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ridgewood, Hawthorne, Oradell, Fair Lawn, Elmwood Park, Dumont, Wyckoff, New Milford, Saddle Brook, Woodland Park and Glen Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen
